channel.title: I need help with hamachi
channel.description:
everytime i try to download it i get this
[IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s156/KoolKidsKlub93/hamachihelp.jpg[/img] it freezes there
then it says would you like an update (i choose "no" because i hear you have to pay for it) someone help me (i want my free hamachi back :( )

item.title: I need help with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @moparleaderssanne moparleaderssanne
item.description:
@moparleaderssanne wrote:

ok… this is how to get your server set up with hamachi…

first: go to this link: [flash=200,200]http://hamachi.cc/download/[/flash] do not fill in the boxes! just go down to download!

second: after you have downloaded hamachi… open it up!

third: look and see what the numbers are on your hamachi screen ( big white top of screen )

fourth: go to the little button that looks like a triangle and click create a new network

fifth: type in the name of your network

sixth: type in the pass of your network

seventh: tell everyone what your name and pass is of your network

eigth: open up moparscape ( make sure you have hamachi running! )

ninth: type in your user name and pass on moparscape… then type in the big white numbers on your hamachi screen as your ip!!!

tenth: click login and there you have it your on your server!!!

hope i helped

Read full topic
